languages.text: "Везунчик Джаспер, порученец господина губернатора и его личный вокс-оператор. Прибыл в звездную гавань по особому распоряжению". {n}Последние слова юноша произносит, отчаянно сражаясь с несолидно всклоченной шевелюрой.{/n}
"Lucky Jaspar, the governor's aide and personal vox operator. I was dispatched to the starport on special orders," {n}the young man proclaims, desperately trying to tame his tousled hair.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Везунчик Джаспер, порученец господина губернатора и его личный вокс-оператор. Прибыл в звездную гавань по особому распоряжению". {n}Последние слова юноша произносит, отчаянно сражаясь с несолидно всклоченной шевелюрой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lucky Jasper, Lord Medineh's aide and the governor's personal vox operator. I was dispatched to the starport on special orders," {n}he says, desperately trying to make his tousled hair look presentable.{/n}

"Lucky Jasper, Lord Medineh's aide and the governor's personal vox operator. I was dispatched to the starport on special orders," {n}he says, desperately trying to make his tousled hair look presentable.{/n}
"Lucky Jaspar, the governor's aide and personal vox operator. I was dispatched to the starport on special orders," {n}the young man proclaims, desperately trying to tame his tousled hair.{/n}
"Lucky Jaspar, the governor's aide and personal vox operator. I was dispatched to the starport on special orders," {n}the young man proclaims, desperately trying to tame his tousled hair.{/n}
"Lucky Jaspar, the governor's aide and personal vox operator. I was dispatched to the starport on special orders," {n}the young man proclaims, desperately trying to tame his tousled hair.{/n}
"Lucky Jaspar, the governor's aide and personal vox operator. I was dispatched to the starport on special orders," {n}the young man proclaims, desperately trying to tame his tousled hair.{/n}

languages.text: "Glückspilz Jaspar, Diener und persönlicher Vox-Operateur des Gouverneurs. Ich habe den Sonderbefehl erhalten, zum Raumhafen zu kommen"{n}, verkündet der junge Mann und versucht dabei verzweifelt, seine widerspenstigen Haare zu zähmen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lucky Jaspar, the governor's aide and personal vox operator. I was dispatched to the starport on special orders," {n}the young man proclaims, desperately trying to tame his tousled hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Glückspilz Jaspar, Diener und persönlicher Vox-Operateur des Gouverneurs. Ich habe den Sonderbefehl erhalten, zum Raumhafen zu kommen"{n}, verkündet der junge Mann und versucht dabei verzweifelt, seine widerspenstigen Haare zu zähmen.{/n}

languages.text: « Jaspar-la-chance, l'aide du gouverneur et son opérateur-vox personnel. On m'a dépêché à l'astroport avec des ordres bien précis, » {n}clame le jeune homme en essayant désespérément de recoiffer ses cheveux ébouriffés.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lucky Jaspar, the governor's aide and personal vox operator. I was dispatched to the starport on special orders," {n}the young man proclaims, desperately trying to tame his tousled hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Jaspar-la-chance, l'aide du gouverneur et son opérateur-vox personnel. On m'a dépêché à l'astroport avec des ordres bien précis, » {n}clame le jeune homme en essayant désespérément de recoiffer ses cheveux ébouriffés.{/n}

languages.text: “我是乐基·贾斯帕，是总督的助手和私人音阵操作员。我来星港执行特别的命令。”{n}这个年轻人一边严肃地说着，一边拼命想理顺乱糟糟的头发。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lucky Jaspar, the governor's aide and personal vox operator. I was dispatched to the starport on special orders," {n}the young man proclaims, desperately trying to tame his tousled hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我是乐基·贾斯帕，是总督的助手和私人音阵操作员。我来星港执行特别的命令。”{n}这个年轻人一边严肃地说着，一边拼命想理顺乱糟糟的头发。{/n}

languages.text: 「ラッキー・ジャスパーと申します。総督の補佐兼個人ヴォクスオペレーターを務めております。特命を受けてこのスターポートに派遣されてきました」{n}青年は、くしゃくしゃの髪を必死に整えながら名乗る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lucky Jaspar, the governor's aide and personal vox operator. I was dispatched to the starport on special orders," {n}the young man proclaims, desperately trying to tame his tousled hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ラッキー・ジャスパーと申します。総督の補佐兼個人ヴォクスオペレーターを務めております。特命を受けてこのスターポートに派遣されてきました」{n}青年は、くしゃくしゃの髪を必死に整えながら名乗る。{/n}

languages.text: «Lucky Jaspar, el ayudante del gobernador y operador voco personal. Me enviaron al puerto estelar con órdenes especiales», {n}proclama el joven, tratando desesperadamente de domar su despeinada cabellera.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lucky Jaspar, the governor's aide and personal vox operator. I was dispatched to the starport on special orders," {n}the young man proclaims, desperately trying to tame his tousled hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lucky Jaspar, el ayudante del gobernador y operador voco personal. Me enviaron al puerto estelar con órdenes especiales», {n}proclama el joven, tratando desesperadamente de domar su despeinada cabellera.{/n}

languages.text: "Valinin emir eri ve kişisel voks operatörü Şanslı Jaspar'ım. Özel emirle yıldız limanına gönderildim." {n}Genç adam, başına buyruk saçlarını umutsuzca dizginlemeye çalışırken beyanda bulunuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lucky Jaspar, the governor's aide and personal vox operator. I was dispatched to the starport on special orders," {n}the young man proclaims, desperately trying to tame his tousled hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Valinin emir eri ve kişisel voks operatörü Şanslı Jaspar'ım. Özel emirle yıldız limanına gönderildim," {n}diye beyan ediyor genç adam, başına buyruk saçlarını umutsuzca dizginlemeye çalışırken.{/n}
